metadata.title: CVE-2023-22617 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: A remote attacker might be able to cause infinite recursion in PowerDNSRecursor 4.8.0 via a DNS query that retrieves DS records for amisconfigured domain, because QName minimization is used in QM fallbackmode. This is fixed in 4.8.1.

criterions.comment: pdns-recursor: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
